author: jdcasey
msg: o Added complex test case for the release plugin, called it2002.
o Added copying of reportArtifacts and extensionArtifacts sets when one MavenProject is constructed with another.
o Added some logging statements to PrepareReleaseMojo, which I will remove later when I'm done with this rash of bugfixes.

author: agilliland
msg: we've defined a new CommentServlet which only handles posted comments.  the old CommentServlet has been rewritten to forward/redirect requests as appropriate.  the comments.vm macros have been updated with new links.
